snippet: Hugo Chavez, the Venezuelan president and a huge baseball fan, left a phone message for fellow Venezuelan Johan Santana after his no-hitter.
abstract: Hugo Chavez, the Venezuelan president and a huge baseball fan, left a phone message for fellow Venezuelan Johan Santana after his no-hitter.
lead_paragraph: Among the people who reached out to congratulate Johan Santana, the Venezuelan left-hander who had just thrown a the first no-hitter in Mets history Friday night, was Hugo Chavez, the Venezuelan president who is a huge baseball fan.

headline.main: Chavez, the Venezuelan President, Sends Congratulatory Wishes to Santana
